title: 07/30/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/30/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best of The Herd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--is skeptical that former Washington Wizard Russell Westbrook joining LeBron James and Anthony Davis on the Lakers is something that will work. There are just as many questions as there are answers. Also, Aaron Rodgers wanted to be part of the managerial process in Green Bay but Doug tells you why that's not realistic for the face of the team. Plus, the "3 and Out" podcast's John Middlekauff has a bad feeling about Carson Wentz--who was ruled out indefinitely with a foot injury.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
In this Best of The Herd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--is skeptical that former Washington Wizard Russell Westbrook joining LeBron James and Anthony Davis on the Lakers is something that will work. There are just as many questions as there are answers. Also, Aaron Rodgers wanted to be part of the managerial process in Green Bay but Doug tells you why that's not realistic for the face of the team. Plus, the "3 and Out" podcast's John Middlekauff has a bad feeling about Carson Wentz--who was ruled out indefinitely with a foot injury.
